title: Champion Mastery needs improvements!
body:
Hello fellow league players,

it's simple: the champion mastery system should be able to recognize what item-build you're aiming for and based on this important factor give  you appropriate grades.
Further, when having a full item build for most people farming isn't an option anymore. But low cs means worse grade after game!

dear regards,

a jungler.

replies.body: BTW falsches Forum (ist die deutsche Seite)

AS far as I know, it is able to difference Summoner spells. So you should be compared with other junglers when you picked smite and since it always is just a comparison you could end up with a B+ even if you did great. In comparison you did meh.
